title: SPAA Conference 2002
brief_description: The Screen Producers Conference is the key national industry conference and is to be held in Melbourne 2001, 2002 and 2003. The conference delegates represent the major broadcast networks, production houses and independent producers in Australia. The Conference is a three day event and usually coincides with the annual Australian Film Institute (AFI)Awards.
